text: Horizon Forbidden West is a 2022 action role-playing game developed by Guerrilla Games and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment. The sequel to Horizon Zero Dawn (2017), the game is set in a post-apocalyptic version of the Western United States, recovering from the aftermath of an extinction event caused by a severe robot swarm. The player is Aloy, like in Horizon Zero Dawn. Category:2022 video games Category:Action role-playing video games
title: Horizon Forbidden West
